items.badge_description: Either you must be sampling or really like beer! That's 12 beers in 1 day.
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 15 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 4.

items.checkin_comment: 2019 MD Craft Beer Festival Catch up

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 90 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 19!

Get out there and raise a ruckus with your favorite Amber or Red Ale! That is 5 different beers with the style of American Amber / Red Ale, American Amber / Red Lager, Irish Red Ale, Imperial / Double Red Ale, Red Ale - Other or IPA - Red. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: 2019 MD Craft Beer Festival Catch up

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 20 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 21)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 22!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 70 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 15!

items.checkin_comment: 2019 MD Craft Beer Festival catch up

items.badge_description: You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 140 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 29.

items.checkin_comment: 2019 MD Craft Beer Festival catch up

items.badge_description: Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 5 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: 2019 MD Craft Beer Festival catch up
2019 MD Craft Beer Festival catch up. The nectarine version was better.

items.badge_description: Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 50 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 11!

Beginning of my 2019 MD Craft Beer Festival catch up's. A great cream ale, one of my favorites of the festival.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 50 distinct venues!

At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 3!

You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 10 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale, try 5 more for Level 3.

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 55 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 12!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 130 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 27.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 19)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 20!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 80 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 17!

At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 60 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 13!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 20 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 5.

Rye isn't just for liquor anymore and many breweries are proving this with delicious rye-style variants. With a unique mix of flavors and bitterness, it'll keep you coming back for more. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: A little more tart than some others of this style I've had

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 80 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 17!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 125 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 26.

items.checkin_comment: The peppery note does a good job of complimenting the fruitiness

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 25 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 6!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 70 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 15!

items.checkin_comment: Probably the best one yet. This one is brewed with all Maryland ingredients.
